title: 'Most ergonomic scissor I‚Äôve used'
body: 'Pros 1. Great ergonomics for both left and right handed people 2. Perfect size for multi use pair of scissors (8.5 cm blade) 3. Decent build and sharpness for the price 4. Has a screw to tighten the blades if they get too loose 5. Nice branding on the blade. 6. Good price MRP100 but got it for 65 with free delivery Cons 1. Limited colors (blue and pink only) 2. Not the sharpest scissors you can buy with a somewhat flat tip and weird wide flat blade design 3. Long term durability is untested 4. Made in China'
